responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What kinds of items are there?
Can I buy shirts, pants, shoes, balls and equipments?
Can I buy tops, bottoms, shoes, balls and equipments?
I want to buy shirts and pants.
responses: We sell sports related items such as tops, bottom, balls, equipments and shoes. To see our products, head on over to the Products page!
Tops, bottoms, balls and many other sports equipments are sold at Spectrum. To see our products, head on over to the Products page!
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
Do I have discounts as a member?
How many outlets do you have?
Where are your outlets located at?
responses: We have 3 outlets in Singapore at Ang Mo Kio, City Hall and Pasir Ris. For more information, head to the About page

patterns: Where do I give my feedbacks?
How do I give my ratings?
I would like to commend Spectrum.
responses: To give feedbacks, head over to our Feedbacks page from the navigation bar at the top
Thank you for visiting us! Head over to the Feedbacks page from the navigation bar at the top to tell us your thoughts

patterns: How do I contact your employees?
How do I give my ratings?
responses: You can email us at demo@gmail.com or call us at (+71)1234567890

patterns: Can I return a faulty product?
How to return a faulty product?
I want to return a spoiled product.
responses: Sorry about that. Please take a picture of the faulty product and email or message us.
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
